name: Bitter Pumpkin #2
description: This recipe is adapted from one by by Rhiannon Enlil of Cure in New Orleans.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon pumpkin butter such as American Spoon Fruit or Stonewall Kitchen

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing glass, stir cocoa, rum, Averna, and pumpkin butter until well mixed. Pour into serving mug or glass.
